question: I had my baby two days ago I was induced at 38 weeks and 5 days due to high blood pressure and gestational diabetes,  I feel great I'm getting around a lot better then most my mom said but my chest does not feel so great it hurts and feels like I'm breathing in cold air when I have it badly hot in the house I did not notice but I had it all the way to 80 degrees and finally felt warm and could breath just wondering if it is normal...
title: quick question
